code: import http from"../http-common";var getAll=function getAll(){return http.get("/actifs");};var getById=function getById(id){return http.get("/actifs/".concat(id));};var getByProfilId=function getByProfilId(idProfil){var params={idProfil:idProfil};return http.post("/actifs/getByProfilId/",{params:params});};export default{getAll:getAll,getById:getById,getByProfilId:getByProfilId};
